data.text: ――Ah!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>――Ah!

data.text:
I see you ♪ 
Heeeeey!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I see you ♪ 
<story>Heeeeey!

data.text:
Right in the middle of training, Fine Motion started dashing 
toward the bleachers...!
data.processed:
<story>Right in the middle of training, Fine Motion started dashing 
<story>toward the bleachers...!

data.text:
Damn. 
Don't just run over here like that...
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Damn. 
<story>Don't just run over here like that...

data.text:
There in the bleachers stood Air Shakur―― 
An Umamusume who debuted before Fine Motion, with 
a penchant for the theoretical.
data.processed:
<story>There in the bleachers stood Air Shakur―― 
<story>An Umamusume who debuted before Fine Motion, with 
<story>a penchant for the theoretical.

data.text: Hmm? Didn't you come to see me?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Hmm? Didn't you come to see me?

data.text: HUH?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: HUH?

data.text: Didn't you come because you wanted to collect my data again?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Didn't you come because you wanted to collect my data again?

data.text:
She didn't say "again" for nothing. 
Whenever we trained, we'd often see Air Shakur with her laptop 
in tow.
data.processed:
<story>She didn't say "again" for nothing. 
<story>Whenever we trained, we'd often see Air Shakur with her laptop 
<story>in tow.

data.text:
...If you don't like it I'll stay out of sight. 
You want me to come back with a warrant or what?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...If you don't like it I'll stay out of sight. 
<story>You want me to come back with a warrant or what?

data.text:
That's not why I called you out! 
I was just thinking, if you're going to be here either way, we 
should train together!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>That's not why I called you out! 
<story>I was just thinking, if you're going to be here either way, we 
<story>should train together!

data.text: You can collect data more efficiently that way, right?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>You can collect data more efficiently that way, right?

data.text:
And risk getting caught in your iron grip? 
Hell no.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>And risk getting caught in your iron grip? 
<story>Hell no.

data.text:
Iron grip... You mean you don't like getting held too tight? 
Does that mean it's okay if we just talk, then?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Iron grip... You mean you don't like getting held too tight? 
<story>Does that mean it's okay if we just talk, then?

data.text:
...Hey. Aren't you supposed to be this clown's trainer? 
Didn't you teach her not to get up in other peoples' business?
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: Do you have a problem with Fine?
Do you have a problem with Fine?

data.processed:
<story>...Hey. Aren't you supposed to be this clown's trainer? 
<story>Didn't you teach her not to get up in other peoples' business?

data.text: HUH!? No shit, of course I have a problem with her!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: HUH!? No shit, of course I have a problem with her!

data.text:
Because I need it. Do I need another reason? 
Valid data doesn't lie. That's all it is.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Because I need it. Do I need another reason? 
<story>Valid data doesn't lie. That's all it is.

data.text:
Think about it. You know the research on the connection between 
genetics and distance aptitude, yeah?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Think about it. You know the research on the connection between 
<story>genetics and distance aptitude, yeah?

data.text:
Anyone who knows anything about racing would have at least 
heard of it. As the theory goes, genes controlling the growth of 
muscle cells are correlated with aptitude for different distances.
data.processed:
<story>Anyone who knows anything about racing would have at least 
<story>heard of it. As the theory goes, genes controlling the growth of 
<story>muscle cells are correlated with aptitude for different distances.

data.text:
Finding and validating that correlation requires a significant 
sample size. The law of large numbers is a just one. 
No sample size, no point.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Finding and validating that correlation requires a significant 
<story>sample size. The law of large numbers is a just one. 
<story>No sample size, no point.

data.text:
But unlike a certain romanticist, I'm not going to let the data 
take the wheel.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>But unlike a certain romanticist, I'm not going to let the data 
<story>take the wheel.

data.text:
Everything in this world is predetermined, sure. 
But where's the fun in a dogshit game where we all follow 
"God's Own Language"?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Everything in this world is predetermined, sure. 
<story>But where's the fun in a dogshit game where we all follow 
<story>"God's Own Language"?

data.text:
If I want to find the bugs in that game... 
I can never have enough data.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>If I want to find the bugs in that game... 
<story>I can never have enough data.

data.text:
...Especially if that data is on people who are different from all 
the rest.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...Especially if that data is on people who are different from all 
<story>the rest.

data.text: Hmm? You mean me?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Hmm? You mean me?

data.text:
I wouldn't give a crap about you otherwise. 
I've seen fluctuations in your data.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>I wouldn't give a crap about you otherwise. 
<story>I've seen fluctuations in your data.

data.text:
Fluctuations that break God's rules. 
If I had put those fluctuations to use...
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Fluctuations that break God's rules. 
<story>If I had put those fluctuations to use...

data.text:
...I might've been able to change that "7cm". 
Though whether that number'd go up or down is anyone's guess.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...I might've been able to change that "7cm". 
<story>Though whether that number'd go up or down is anyone's guess.

data.text:
――"7cm". 
For Air Shakur, that number represents despair.
data.processed:
<story>――"7cm". 
<story>For Air Shakur, that number represents despair.

data.text:
After claiming her first crown at the Satsuki Sho, she met 
defeat at the Japanese Derby by a mere seven centimeters.
data.processed:
<story>After claiming her first crown at the Satsuki Sho, she met 
<story>defeat at the Japanese Derby by a mere seven centimeters.

data.text:
Afterward, she won the Kikuka Sho, and earned the title of 
"Double Crown Umamusume", but...
data.processed:
<story>Afterward, she won the Kikuka Sho, and earned the title of 
<story>"Double Crown Umamusume", but...

data.text: "In the end... All I could prove was that data is absolute."
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>"In the end... All I could prove was that data is absolute."

data.text:
Those were her only words after the race. 
I remembered the sight of her leaving the interview――
data.processed:
<story>Those were her only words after the race. 
<story>I remembered the sight of her leaving the interview――

data.text: Shakur...
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Shakur...

data.text:
...Shit. 
I said too much.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...Shit. 
<story>I said too much.

data.text: W-wait!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>W-wait!

data.text:
...The hell do you want? 
Say something stupid and you'll regret it.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...The hell do you want? 
<story>Say something stupid and you'll regret it.

data.text: Oh, I get it. Does Her Gracious Royal Highness demand the commoner pay tribute for her precious data?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: Oh, I get it. Does Her Gracious Royal Highness demand the commoner pay tribute for her precious data?

data.text:
It's not about the data. 
I mean...
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>It's not about the data. 
<story>I mean...

data.text: I just want to spend a little more time talking with you.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>I just want to spend a little more time talking with you.

data.text:
Don't bother. 
If you wanna chat, go talk with your trainer for all I care.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Don't bother. 
<story>If you wanna chat, go talk with your trainer for all I care.

data.text:
Oh. Right, you. 
...You better keep your eye on her.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Oh. Right, you. 
<story>...You better keep your eye on her.

data.text: ...I mean, don't just let her mess around all the time.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...I mean, don't just let her mess around all the time.

data.text: ――It's your job to keep her running till the very end.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>――It's your job to keep her running till the very end.

data.text:
Shakur's the same as always, huh? 
She sure has a unique way of communicating.
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: You really like that about her, huh.
You really like that about her, huh.

data.processed:
<story>Shakur's the same as always, huh? 
<story>She sure has a unique way of communicating.

data.text: Haha, you figured it out?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Haha, you figured it out?

data.text:
You're right. Shakur's different from all the other friends I've 
made here.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>You're right. Shakur's different from all the other friends I've 
<story>made here.

data.text:
It's not just the way she talks and acts... 
Oh, to be clear, I still love that about her.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>It's not just the way she talks and acts... 
<story>Oh, to be clear, I still love that about her.

data.text:
But the most important thing is that I really respect her... 
...I suppose.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>But the most important thing is that I really respect her... 
<story>...I suppose.

data.text:
Even in the depths of despair, she won't stop thinking of ways 
out.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Even in the depths of despair, she won't stop thinking of ways 
<story>out.

data.text:
She's so smart, and so cool. 
That's what I like about her.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>She's so smart, and so cool. 
<story>That's what I like about her.

data.text:
I could feel the respect in her words when she spoke about 
her.
data.processed:
<story>I could feel the respect in her words when she spoke about 
<story>her.

data.text:
But what does Air Shakur think of Fine? 
It seemed like Fine's talent caught Shakur's eye, and there was 
some analysis going on, but...
data.processed:
<story>But what does Air Shakur think of Fine? 
<story>It seemed like Fine's talent caught Shakur's eye, and there was 
<story>some analysis going on, but...

data.text:
...Especially if that data is on people who are different from all 
the rest.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...Especially if that data is on people who are different from all 
<story>the rest.

data.text:
It was like Shakur felt "something else" that set Fine Motion 
apart...
data.processed:
<story>It was like Shakur felt "something else" that set Fine Motion 
<story>apart...
